projects.title: TeleStorage
projects.full_description: TeleStorage is a Windows client that allows users to upload and download encrypted files to and from their Telegram channel, creating a secure and virtually limitless personal cloud storage system.

projects.title: Gesture - Controls - Media
projects.short_description: Windows client uses gestures for controlling media across various platforms.
projects.full_description: This project is a Windows client that utilizes the webcam to recognize and interpret users' hand gestures, including finger counts and finger placements relative to the webcam's top, bottom, right, or left. This intuitive system allows users to control media playback across various platforms, from YouTube and Netflix to locally downloaded content in VLC Media Player. By leveraging gesture-based controls, it offers a novel and interactive way to manage digital media seamlessly.

projects.title: PyBrawl
projects.full_description: PyBrawl is a 2D fighting game developed using Python and the Pygame library. It features multiple characters, various fighting stages, and a robust combat system.

projects.title: FRAS
projects.full_description: This project involves a Windows client that revolutionizes traditional attendance methods through facial recognition technology. By leveraging this advanced approach, it significantly enhances efficiency in marking attendance. The system maintains a comprehensive database of registered users, cataloging their facial features, and employs sophisticated algorithms to train a model capable of accurately recognizing these faces. This innovative solution not only streamlines the attendance process but also provides a cutting-edge alternative to conventional methods.

projects.title: BeeShell
